title: 121 - Church Clarity
description:
This week we respond to the recently developed website and database, http://www.churchclarity.org.  Since it's launch, many folks have expressed concern and support for the efforts put forth here.  In this episode we share 4 points of view that express concern for it's efforts. If you would like to hear one of the founders, George Mekhail, share his story about starting this, I can suggest you listen to his interview on the Bad Christian Podcast here: https://soundcloud.com/bcpod/328-church-clarity-with-george#t=26:21

The VOX Podcast with Mike Erre

- Mike Erre
